Title: ExceptionViews
Description: This is a WinForms project that shows exception information. You can use either the control or a dialog window. The main reason I published this project is due to other projects I have that have a dependency on this code. It's not the prettiest code I've ever written, but it's functional!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a WinForms project that shows exception information. You can use either the control or a dialog window. The main reason I published this project is due to other projects I have that have a dependency on this code. It's not the prettiest code I've ever written, but it's functional!
